Title: Relates to postponing fare increases during the COVID-19 pandemic; authorizes the metropolitan transportation authority to conduct a study on reducing fares
Summary: Relates to postponing fare increases during the COVID-19 pandemic; authorizes the metropolitan transportation authority to conduct an economic feasibility study on reducing fares.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to postponing fare increases during the COVID-19 pandemic; authorizing the metropolitan transportation authority to conduct a study on reducing fares; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
